definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: The Russian Oyster Mushroom is an edible variety that belongs to she Shimeji family.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯平菇屬於姬菇科中可食用的一種。

sentences.english: The rough extract of Pinggu mushroom PPO was obtained by ammonium sulfate precipitation method.
sentences.chinese: 採用硫酸銨沉澱法得到平菇多酚氧化酶粗提液。

sentences.english: There are no significant differences in the effects that different volume and density have on Pleurotus ostreatus' quality.
sentences.chinese: 不同容積和容重處理對平菇品質的影響無顯著性差異。

sentences.english: The pileus ultrastructure of Pleurotus ostreatus was investigated with transmission electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 利用透射電鏡，對平菇菌蓋的超微結構進行了觀察。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is of great significance to study the virus-elimination technique of Pleurotus ostreatus virus.
sentences.chinese: 因此，進行平菇病毒的脫除研究具有非常重要的意義。

sentences.english: Para-Medic: I see you've found some Russian Oyster Mushrooms.
sentences.chinese: 我看到你採了一些蘇聯平菇。

sentences.english: Morels have 9 amino acids much like oyster mushrooms;
sentences.chinese: 羊肚菌就象平菇一樣有9種氨基酸。

sentences.english: In such adits people grow mostly champignons and oyster mushrooms.
sentences.chinese: 人們通常在這樣的洞穴裏種植香草和平菇。

definition: enoki mushroom (Flammulina velutipes, Japanese えのき茸 enokitake), used in cuisines of Japan, Korea and China, cultivated to be long, thin and white/abbr. to 金菇
tofu skin (made by drying the skin that forms on the surface of soymilk during cooking, and therefore not actually made from tofu)
